Summary._: Southbound [E][F][M][R] trains are running express from 71 Av to Roosevelt Av because emergency teams are assisting someone that was struck by a train at 63 Dr.

Description._: Southbound [E][F][M][R] trains are running express from 71 Av to Roosevelt Av because emergency teams are assisting someone that was struck by a train at 63 Dr.

LongDescription:
The is no [E], [F] and [R] trains between Forest Hills-71 Av and Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av in both directions.

There is no [M] train service between Forest Hills-71 Av to Essex St in both directions.

Uptown [R] trains are stopping along the [Q] line from 57 St-7 Av to 96 St-2 Av.

These service changes are because of an NYPD investigation at 63 Dr-Rego Park.

LIRR will accommodate NYCT metro card customers at the following locations at no additional charge: Forest Hills, Kew Gardens, Jamaica and Penn Station.

Travel Alternative: Take Q60 buses making nearby station stops along Queens Blvd or take [J], [Z] or [7] trains for service to Manhattan.
